author: Josh Dzieza
title: Amazon warehouse workers walk out in rising tide of COVID-19 protests
description: As Amazon workers across the country test positive for the virus, employees believe collective action is the only way to get the company to meaningfully clean its facilities.
content:
As Amazon workers across the country test positive for the virus, employees believe collective action is the only way to get the company to meaningfully clean its facilities
New York Communities For Change
